mapper.update: update order_logistics set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logistics_name = #{logisticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_number = #{logisticsNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cs_out_storage_id = #{csOutStorageId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, logistics_name, logistics_number, created_at, updated_at, cs_out_storage_id from order_logistics
